snippet: The move comes amid a scandal that has ensnared Gen. John R. Allen, the NATO commander in Afghanistan, although officials said Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta had planned the review before the scandal broke.
lead_paragraph: The move comes amid a scandal that has ensnared Gen. John R. Allen, the NATO commander in Afghanistan, although officials said Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta had planned the review before the scandal broke.

headline.seo: Panetta Orders Review of Ethics Training for Officers
